title: Wicked city (D)
creator_credit: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Makoto Sedani, Kenji Karada and Manga Entertainment
brief_description: The treaty between humans and demons which has existed for centuries is due for renewal. The treaty is needed to prevent the world from plunging into chaos and destruction. Terrorists from both sides use the opportunity to sabotage the agreement so that they may reign supreme.
creator_credit_for_label: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Makoto Sedani, Kenji Karada and Manga Entertainment
